page.title: 14A day at Primary School
page.content:
by Karen Robson - continued
The first afternoon lesson was geography. We were finishing off a plan of our classroom, then, when we had finished, we were to do a plan of our bedroom. At playtime we played catch. On the way to our next lesson we saw a lackey moth caterpillar, then we did group reading. My book was called the Sea-horses of the Far Islands. Then just before home time we had the story of Captain Cobweb and the Quoge.Then I rang the bell and got all my things together. Mummy met me with Basil our dog. On the way home Mummy told me that she had cancelled the trip to an open air theatre because the weather was so cold and wet. The theatre play was the Merry Wives of Windsor. When we got home I had my tea. At 7pm I went to bed.
